class_libraries.library:
<class name="oxin_filters/PassThroughFilter" type="oxin_filters::PassThroughFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
A simple Pass Through Filter for sensor_msgs/PointCloud2 messages

<class name="oxin_filters/CropBoxFilter" type="oxin_filters::CropBoxFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
A Crop Box filter for sensor_msgs/PointCloud2 messages

<class name="oxin_filters/VoxelGridFilter" type="oxin_filters::VoxelGridFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
A Voxel Grid filter for sensor_msgs/PointCloud2 messages

<class name="oxin_filters/SacSegmentationExtractFilter" type="oxin_filters::SacSegmentationExtractFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Extract a model with segmentation methods for sensor_msgs/PointCloud2 messages

<class name="oxin_filters/RadiusOutlierRemovalFilter" type="oxin_filters::RadiusOutlierRemovalFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
A Radius Outlier Removal filter for sensor_msgs/PointCloud2 messages.
